title: Lambert's adventures in ZeroNet land
description: My ZeroBlog, hosted in the nowhere of a P2P web.

post.title: Just another test: Does it have a trackback / pingback functionality?
post.body: And since I'm too lazy to look into (and understand) the code, let me just try, please. Here comes the [test link](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14feUXtxkukdA9qutsHtKrAdXcYm5nnViu/?Post:2:Etwas+gew%C3%B6hnungsbed%C3%BCrftig) and another try [test link](14feUXtxkukdA9qutsHtKrAdXcYm5nnViu/?Post:2:Etwas+gew%C3%B6hnungsbed%C3%BCrftig)

post.title: My main homepage stays on the old centralized web ;-) Look for: http://biblionik.de
post.body: Waiting for a script that synchronizes static WordPress pages to ZeroNet...

post.title: Just a test
post.body: My very first blogpost on my very own blog "hosted" on ZeroNet ;-)
